TravelerSTSMod:InkDrop.NAME: Drop Of Ink
TravelerSTSMod:InkDrop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Deal !D! damage again and apply !M! travelerstsmod:Whispers.

TravelerSTSMod:EmptySpell.NAME: Emptiness Spell
TravelerSTSMod:EmptySpell.DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL At 4 travelerstsmod:Verses: Draw !M! cards. NL Once per turn, travelerstsmod:Action: Exhaust a card in the between.

TravelerSTSMod:PainSpell.NAME: Pain Spell
TravelerSTSMod:PainSpell.DESCRIPTION: For each travelerstsmod:Verse you have, deal !D! damage.

TravelerSTSMod:SuddenStrike.NAME: Lethal Strike
TravelerSTSMod:SuddenStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At 1 travelerstsmod:Verse: Multiply this damage by !M! times.

TravelerSTSMod:TemblorSpell.NAME: Shock Spell
TravelerSTSMod:TemblorSpell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! travelerstsmod:Whispers at the start of your next turn.

TravelerSTSMod:AmuletSpell.NAME: Protection Spell
TravelerSTSMod:AmuletSpell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When your travelerstsmod:Verse reaches 5 stacks, return this to hand from discard pile and reduce the cost by 1 this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:MindSnoop.NAME: Snoop Mind
TravelerSTSMod:MindSnoop.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL If the target has travelerstsmod:Whispers, gain [E].

TravelerSTSMod:RigmaroleSpell.NAME: Prolix Spell
TravelerSTSMod:RigmaroleSpell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce this card's cost by 1 and shuffle it into draw pile.

TravelerSTSMod:Ghost.NAME: The Ghost
TravelerSTSMod:Ghost.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your last card played is not this. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! travelerstsmod:Whispers. NL Put this back on the top of draw pile.

TravelerSTSMod:QuickSpell.NAME: Rush Spell
TravelerSTSMod:QuickSpell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Set the cost of a random Spell in hand to 0 until you play it this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:InkSplash.NAME: Splash Ink
TravelerSTSMod:InkSplash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Apply !M! travelerstsmod:Whispers to ALL enemies.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellStorm.NAME: Chain Spell
TravelerSTSMod:SpellStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL This deals !M! additional damage for each Spell you've played in this combat.

TravelerSTSMod:BirthSpell.NAME: Rebirth Spell
TravelerSTSMod:BirthSpell.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! travelerstsmod:Ink. NL Restore 3 HP. NL Remove this from deck when played.
TravelerSTSMod:BirthSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! travelerstsmod:Ink. NL Restore 6 HP. NL Remove this from deck when played.

TravelerSTSMod:Hypnotize.NAME: Hypnotize
TravelerSTSMod:Hypnotize.DESCRIPTION: Apply travelerstsmod:Whispers at the amount of travelerstsmod:Verses you have. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:Hypnotize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply travelerstsmod:Whispers at the amount of travelerstsmod:Verses you have. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:ShuttleSpell.NAME: Shuttling Spell
TravelerSTSMod:ShuttleSpell.DESCRIPTION: Draw 3 cards. NL If you have over 1 travelerstsmod:Verse, Exhaust this.

TravelerSTSMod:TurnPages.NAME: Turn The Pages
TravelerSTSMod:TurnPages.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to travelerstsmod:Verses you have. NL Reset travelerstsmod:Verses to 1.
TravelerSTSMod:TurnPages.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to travelerstsmod:Verses you have +3. NL Reset travelerstsmod:Verses to 1.

TravelerSTSMod:Wisdom.NAME: Wisdom
TravelerSTSMod:Wisdom.DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of a random card in hand to 0 until you play it this turn.
TravelerSTSMod:Wisdom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Set the cost of a card in hand to 0 until you play it this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Vacillate.NAME: Vacillate
TravelerSTSMod:Vacillate.DESCRIPTION: Choose an enemy with travelerstsmod:Whispers. NL The target loses Strength this turn at the amount equal to the travelerstsmod:Verses you have.

TravelerSTSMod:BarrierSpell.NAME: Barrier Spell
TravelerSTSMod:BarrierSpell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At 2 travelerstsmod:Verses: Multiply this Block by !M! times.

TravelerSTSMod:Wrath.NAME: Wrath
TravelerSTSMod:Wrath.DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Once per turn, travelerstsmod:Action: Gain [E].

TravelerSTSMod:Envy.NAME: Envy
TravelerSTSMod:Envy.DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL Draw !M! cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action*: Gain 1 travelerstsmod:Verse.

TravelerSTSMod:Organize.NAME: Organize Minds
TravelerSTSMod:Organize.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] at the start of your next turn.
TravelerSTSMod:Organize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] and draw a card at the start of your next turn.

TravelerSTSMod:DistortingStrike.NAME: Distorting Strike
TravelerSTSMod:DistortingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Vulnerable to each enemy with travelstsmod:Whispers at the same amount of its travelstsmod:Whispers.
TravelerSTSMod:DistortingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Vulnerable and Weak to each enemy with travelstsmod:Whispers at the same amount of its travelstsmod:Whispers.

TravelerSTSMod:Paranoid.NAME: Paranoid
TravelerSTSMod:Paranoid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Transform a card in hand to be a copy of this in this combat.

TravelerSTSMod:ExplodeSpell.NAME: Explosion Spell
TravelerSTSMod:ExplodeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At 6 travelerstsmod:Verses: Gain !M! [E].

TravelerSTSMod:CriticalAttack.NAME: Critical Attack
TravelerSTSMod:CriticalAttack.DESCRIPTION: When this card is in your hand, costs 1 less for every 2 cards you play this turn. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block.

TravelerSTSMod:Notes.NAME: Notes
TravelerSTSMod:Notes.DESCRIPTION: Mark an enemy in this game. NL If the species of the enemy is already marked, deal !D! damage and gain 1 travelerstsmod:Ink. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:Recount.NAME: Recount
TravelerSTSMod:Recount.DESCRIPTION: Apply X travelerstsmod:Whispers. NL Play a copy of this which X effect is reduced by 1 when X is above 0. (damage = (p^3 + 2p)/3, p=X)
TravelerSTSMod:Recount.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X+1 travelerstsmod:Whispers. NL Play a copy of this which X effect is reduced by 1 when X+1 is above 0. (damage = (p^3 + 2p)/3, p=X+1)

TravelerSTSMod:Palindrome.NAME: Palindrome
TravelerSTSMod:Palindrome.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! Spells is played twice.

TravelerSTSMod:Caustic.NAME: Corrode
TravelerSTSMod:Caustic.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 travelerstsmod:Whispers. Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Apply 3 travelerstsmod:Whispers again.
TravelerSTSMod:Caustic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Double the travelerstsmod:Verses on the target. This no longer consumes *Ink in this combat.

TravelerSTSMod:MemoryLoss.NAME: Memory Loss
TravelerSTSMod:MemoryLoss.DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: NL Play the last card shuffled into discard pile. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:MemoryLoss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: NL Play the last card shuffled into discard pile and add it to hand.

TravelerSTSMod:VajraSpell.NAME: Adamas Spell
TravelerSTSMod:VajraSpell.DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:LiteraryTalent.NAME: Brilliant Writing
TravelerSTSMod:LiteraryTalent.DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Gain 2 [E] and draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:LiteraryTalent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Gain 2 [E] and draw 3 cards.

TravelerSTSMod:Squeeze.NAME: Squeeze
TravelerSTSMod:Squeeze.DESCRIPTION: Discard ALL 0-cost cards, unplayable Status and Curses in hand. NL Gain [E] for each card discarded.

TravelerSTSMod:ThinkHard.NAME: Pondering
TravelerSTSMod:ThinkHard.DESCRIPTION: Draw 5 cards. NL At 2 travelerstsmod:Verses: Retain up to !M! cards in hand in this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellIntensify.NAME: Spell Intensification
TravelerSTSMod:SpellIntensify.DESCRIPTION: For each other Spell you've played this turn, NL draw !M! card.
TravelerSTSMod:SpellIntensify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL For each Spell you've play this turn, NL draw a card.

TravelerSTSMod:SurgeSpell.NAME: Surging Spell
TravelerSTSMod:SurgeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] equal to half amount of travelerstsmod:Verses you have. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:AbsorbSpell.NAME: Absortion Spell
TravelerSTSMod:AbsorbSpell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At 4 travelerstsmod:Verses: Convert attack damage Blocked this turn to your Block next turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Sloth.NAME: Sloth
TravelerSTSMod:Sloth.DESCRIPTION: *Personality . NL Draw 2 cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action: Gain !M! Block.

TravelerSTSMod:Lust.NAME: Lust
TravelerSTSMod:Lust.DESCRIPTION: *Personality . NL Draw 2 cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action: Apply !M! travelerstsmod:Whispers to a random enemy.

TravelerSTSMod:ContractSpell.NAME: Contract Spell
TravelerSTSMod:ContractSpell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Adjacent cards cost 0 until they are played this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:BadOmen.NAME: Evil Omen
TravelerSTSMod:BadOmen.DESCRIPTION: The enemy keeps ALL travelerstsmod:Whispers at the start of its next turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Illusion.NAME: Illusion
TravelerSTSMod:Illusion.DESCRIPTION: Add a random *Personality to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:Solidify.NAME: Concretion
TravelerSTSMod:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block plus !M! for each travelerstsmod:Ink you have.

TravelerSTSMod:Chant.NAME: Chant
TravelerSTSMod:Chant.DESCRIPTION: At 2 travelerstsmod:Verses: ALL your Spells cost 1 less next turn.
TravelerSTSMod:Chant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At 2 travelerstsmod:Verses: ALL your Spells cost 1 less next turn. At 6 travelerstsmod:Verses also works.

TravelerSTSMod:Gluttony.NAME: Gluttony
TravelerSTSMod:Gluttony.DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL Draw 2 cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action: Upgrade the card that triggers this.
TravelerSTSMod:Gluttony.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL Draw 2 cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action: Upgrade the card that triggers this and the cards in the between.

TravelerSTSMod:MindSplit.NAME: Schizophrenia
TravelerSTSMod:MindSplit.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 travelerstsmod:Whispers. NL If this triggers a *Personality's travelerstsmod:Action, return this to hand after playing and increase this gain by 2.
TravelerSTSMod:MindSplit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 travelerstsmod:Whispers to ALL enemies. NL If this triggers a *Personality's travelerstsmod:Action, return this to hand after playing and increase this gain by 2.

TravelerSTSMod:Inking.NAME: Inking
TravelerSTSMod:Inking.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Add an additional card reward in the non-boss combat reward.
TravelerSTSMod:Inking.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 travelerstsmod:Ink: Add an additional card reward in the non-boss combat reward.

TravelerSTSMod:HeartLock.NAME: Heart Lock
TravelerSTSMod:HeartLock.DESCRIPTION: Whenever travelerstsmod:Verse reaches 7 stacks, reset it to 1 and gain !M! Block.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellAmplify.NAME: Spell Amplification
TravelerSTSMod:SpellAmplify.DESCRIPTION: After you play a Spell, gain !M! travelerstsmod:Verse.

TravelerSTSMod:Melody.NAME: Melodies
TravelerSTSMod:Melody.DESCRIPTION: Whenever travelerstsmod:Verse reaches 4 stacks, draw a card.
TravelerSTSMod:Melody.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever travelerstsmod:Verse reaches 4 stacks, draw a card.

TravelerSTSMod:EchoSpell.NAME: Echo Spell
TravelerSTSMod:EchoSpell.DESCRIPTION: travelerstsmod:Whispers is reduced by half instead of ALL at the start of enemies' turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Swallow.NAME: Swallow
TravelerSTSMod:Swallow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, gain !M! travelerstsmod:Ink. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:FromAbyss.NAME: From The Abyss
TravelerSTSMod:FromAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If you have no travelerstsmod:Ink, gain 1 travelerstsmod:Ink and deal double damage instead.

TravelerSTSMod:Somniloquy.NAME: Somniloquy
TravelerSTSMod:Somniloquy.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the amount of travelerstsmod:Verses -1. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:Somniloquy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the amount of travelerstsmod:Verses. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:TimePassed.NAME: Passage
TravelerSTSMod:TimePassed.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand to become a copy of another card in hand. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:TimePassed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand to become a copy of another card in hand.

TravelerSTSMod:Greed.NAME: Greed
TravelerSTSMod:Greed.DESCRIPTION: *Personality. NL Draw !M! cards. NL travelerstsmod:Action: Draw a card.

TravelerSTSMod:Transcend.NAME: Transcendence
TravelerSTSMod:Transcend.DESCRIPTION: Consume 2 travelerstsmod:Ink: Gain an extra turn and end your turn. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:Alchemy.NAME: Alchemy
TravelerSTSMod:Alchemy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL At 3 travelerstsmod:Verses: Gain !M! golds. NL Exhaust.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellSearch.NAME: Search Spell
TravelerSTSMod:SpellSearch.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a Spell in draw pile and move it to hand. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:SpellSearch.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a Spell in draw pile and move it to hand.

TravelerSTSMod:VoidBelief.NAME: Void Belief
TravelerSTSMod:VoidBelief.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [E]. NL Decrease by 1 for the rest of the combat.

TravelerSTSMod:Recall.NAME: Retrospect
TravelerSTSMod:Recall.DESCRIPTION: If discard pile size is less than or equal to max hand size, swap ALL your hand with the cards in discard pile.

TravelerSTSMod:PrideForm.NAME: Pride Form
TravelerSTSMod:PrideForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. *Personality. NL Add a random *Personality to your hand at the start of your turn. The *Personality gains Ethereal. NL travelerstsmod:Action: This costs 1 less.
TravelerSTSMod:PrideForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. *Personality. NL Add a random *Personality to your hand at the start of your turn. Upgrade the *Personality and it gains Ethereal. NL travelerstsmod:Action: This costs 1 less.

TravelerSTSMod:GazeOfAbyss.NAME: Gaze From The Abyss
TravelerSTSMod:GazeOfAbyss.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply travelerstsmod:Whispers to a random enemy at the amount equal to travelerstsmod:Verses you have at the end of last turn.
TravelerSTSMod:GazeOfAbyss.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, apply travelerstsmod:Whispers to ALL enemies at the amount equal to travelerstsmod:Verses you have at the end of last turn.

TravelerSTSMod:Degenerate.NAME: Degeneration
TravelerSTSMod:Degenerate.DESCRIPTION: *Personality's travelerstsmod:Action will trigger one another time.
TravelerSTSMod:Degenerate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL *Personality's travelerstsmod:Action will trigger one another time.

TravelerSTSMod:QuickCasting.NAME: Swift Casting
TravelerSTSMod:QuickCasting.DESCRIPTION: Spells cost 0. NL Whenever you play a Spell, Exhaust it and draw a card.

TravelerSTSMod:VoiceOfDark.NAME: Voice Of Darkness
TravelerSTSMod:VoiceOfDark.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply travelerstsmod:Whispers to an enemy, apply Poison to the enemy at the same amount.

TravelerSTSMod:AnotherPath.NAME: Another Path
TravelerSTSMod:AnotherPath.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand. NL If the chosen has extra effect at some travelerstsmod:Verses, set your *Verses to it needs.
TravelerSTSMod:AnotherPath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand. NL If the chosen has extra effect at some travelerstsmod:Verses, it costs 1 less and set your *Verses to it needs.

TravelerSTSMod:Inspire.NAME: Inspiration
TravelerSTSMod:Inspire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have 2 or more travelerstsmod:Ink, draw 2 cards.

TravelerSTSMod:SpellKit.NAME: Spell Kit
TravelerSTSMod:SpellKit.DESCRIPTION: Add X random Spells to your hand. NL Each of them costs 0 until you play it this turn. NL Exhaust.
TravelerSTSMod:SpellKit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X+1 random Spells to your hand. NL Each of them costs 0 until you play it this turn.

TravelerSTSMod:SilentSpell.NAME: Silence Spell
TravelerSTSMod:SilentSpell.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL travelerstsmod:Whispers from ALL enemies. NL Gain Plated Armor equal to the *Whispers removed. NL  Exhaust .
TravelerSTSMod:SilentSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL travelerstsmod:Whispers from ALL enemies. NL Gain Plated Armor equal to the *Whispers removed.
